text: 17 Squadron SAAF is a squadron of the South African Air Force. It is currently a transport/utility helicopter squadron. * First formed: 1 September 1939 * Historic aircraft flown: Junkers Ju 52/3m, Blenheim V, Lockheed Ventura GR V, Vickers Wellington, Vickers Warwick GR V, Harvard, Sikorsky S-55, Sikorsky S-51, Sud Aviation Alouette II, Aérospatiale Alouette III, Aérospatiale Puma, SA 365N Dauphin * Current aircraft flown: Atlas Oryx, Agusta A109LUH * Current base: AFB Swartkop, Pretoria. ==External links== *17 Squadron SAAF Unofficial Website *Spanish tourist rescued during night helicopter operation on Drakensberg escarpment Category:Squadrons of the South African Air Force SAAF17 Category:Military units and formations established in 1939 Category:1939 establishments in South Africa
title: 17 Squadron SAAF
